messages.title: Fighting against Hard Brexit
messages.content: Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

messages.title: Standing up for the NHS
messages.content: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give our NHS the funding it needs.

messages.title: Opposing school cuts
messages.content: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative party that has stopped listening to local people in York Outer. James Blanchard will fight against any cuts to our local schools.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We know we need additional investment in health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give our NHS the funding it needs.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative party that has stopped listening to local people in York Outer. James Blanchard will fight against any cuts to our local schools.
Local services are under threat from conservative cuts.
Liberal Democrats are the only party that has always fought for Britain’s membership of the European Union, and that’s why we are fighting for you to have your say on the final Brexit deal.

issues.brexitEurope: Fighting against Hard Brexit, Brexit is causing prices to rise, 3 things to think about since the referendum:  Prices in the shops are rising faster than wages, We haven’t seen the extra money for the NHS that we were promised, Jobs have left the UK
issues.economy: UK inflation rate leaps to 2.3%, Food prices UP, Petrol prices UP
issues.education: Opposing school cuts, Schools: Why won’t the Government listen?, Conservative cuts to our schools mean fewer teachers and bigger classes. Schools in York Outer are set to lose thousands from their budgets.
issues.government: Conservative cuts are hurting the NHS, Conservative cuts to our vital services are going too far.
issues.health: Standing up for the NHS, Protect the NHS, The Liberal Democrats are campaigning to protect the things people care about most - jobs, the NHS and schools. LIB DEMS WILL GIVE THE NHS THE EXTRA CASH IT NEEDS

examples: Local schools are under threat from a Conservative party that has stopped listening to local people in York Outer.
